about_the_game:
Prepare for an exhilarating journey in this platforming adventure, where every step is a test of skill and perseverance. Ascend towering platforms, execute breathtaking leaps of faith, and navigate the narrowest of paths with precision. You'll find yourself standing in places you never imagined possible.

The game’s realistic physics and unique control mechanics demand patience and mastery, offering a rewarding experience for those who rise to the challenge. Immerse yourself in a world of serene landscapes accompanied by a soothing soundtrack, making each climb both a challenge and a pleasure.
detailed_description:
Prepare for an exhilarating journey in this platforming adventure, where every step is a test of skill and perseverance. Ascend towering platforms, execute breathtaking leaps of faith, and navigate the narrowest of paths with precision. You'll find yourself standing in places you never imagined possible.

The game’s realistic physics and unique control mechanics demand patience and mastery, offering a rewarding experience for those who rise to the challenge. Immerse yourself in a world of serene landscapes accompanied by a soothing soundtrack, making each climb both a challenge and a pleasure.
name: Heaven's Ladder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100, AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT

short_description: Embark on a challenging platforming adventure where precision, patience, and skill are key to navigating breathtaking landscapes and reaching new heights.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
